Html.name: Html0
Html.content: Typically a collector allows the creation of new content instances of the resource type it collects by clicking on the “plus” symbol of the flyout-menu of the first list entry. New resources are created inside a configured folder (see (sub-)sitemap configuration and module configuration); typically below a /.content/ directory inside the VFS of OpenCms. Please have a look at the Java documentation of the resource collector's interface methods getCreateLink() and getCreateParam() for more details about creating resources with collectors.
